name: CoffeeFlavorSorterPro
description:
Best played with number pad (keyboard required) & sound

A game of quick-reflexes, make coffee orders for a very high-tech chaotic coffee machine without spilling too much coffee! 

Made in the context of the IndieSpeedRun 2014 game jam in Construct 2.

Team:

  • Alicia Fortier: Design & Gameplay programming
  • Alexander Westcott: Music & Sound Design
  • Nara Van Rossum: Illustration & Programming
